generated_description: ascendum, legally known as ascendum machinery srl., based in bucharest, romania, is the general representative of volvo ce, rammer, and k-tec in romania and the republic of moldova. the company specializes in the sale, rental, leasing, financing, and maintenance of construction equipment. ascendum offers a comprehensive range of products, including electric construction equipment, attachments, and accessories, as well as parts and services. they also provide telematic solutions and smart assistance systems to optimize fleet performance and fuel consumption. ascendum is known for its professional, flexible, and rapid service offerings, including 24-hour parts logistics and on-site service.
